start.text: They have zero chance. Our manliness is overwhelming.

start_boss.text: I would not have thought such monsters existed!
There are many enemies, but it is okay because there is one me.

retreat.text: As you say. Back to drawing board.
Real men don't cry! Real men don't cry!

out_of_missiles.text: Gun is empty, damn it to hell!

engaged.text: This one will fall before me.
Enemy peoples have placed their eyeballs on me!

need_help.text: Come on! Shoot me! I'm right here!

pursuing.text: Does my manliness make you afraid?
We must be well groomed for battle. Oil up those muscles!

running.text: The hairs on the back of my neck are... upstanding...

hull_90.text: I assume I get big bonus for this?
Stupid fools push me too far!
It is dangerous to be here. I think it might also be unsafe.
Do that again and I will crush you!

hull_50.text: Damn it, damn it, damn it! This is not possible!
If I take any more hits, I will die and be dead.
Aaaaahhh! I have hurting! I have bleeding!

hull_30.text: My life is... flashing... before my eyes...

overload.text: Damn it to hell! I do not see what is going on!
Damn it to hell! This is broken junk!

victory.text: At this rate, I soon be perfect!
Ha ha ha! All evil has been lifted and separated.
That is how a real man does it!
